trends: There have been 8 other sightings in Lancaster
There were no other sightings in Lancaster on or around November 21st 2009
Summary: DARK TRIANGLE WITH CIRCULAR WHITE LIGHTS ON BOTTOM.
divs: Sighting DetailsAT 11:19PM ON 21 NOV 2009, I WAS IN MY BACK YARD FACING DUE EAST LOOKING AT ORION AND TUARAS THE BULL STAR CONSTALATION, WHEN A DARK TRIANGLE CRAFT WITH CIRCULAR WHITE LIGHTS ON THE BOTTOM, PASSED FROM NORTH TO SOUTH AS I GUAGED BY THE POSITION OF THE NORTH STAR, AND IT PASSED BETWEEN ORION AND TUARAS THE BULL...SOUTHBOUND...IT SIGHTING LASTED ABOUT EIGHT SECONDS AND MADE ABSOLUTLY NO NOISE..THEIR WERE ALEAST SEVEN OR EIGHT LIGHTS ON THE BOTTOM WITH ONE IN THE CENTER OF THE CRAFT. I WATCH JETS GO OVER AND THESE WHITE LIGHTS WERE DIFFERENT FROM COMERCIAL JET LIGHTS THAT GO OVER AT ABOUT THE SAME ALTITUDE AS THE CRAFT WAS. THE TRIANGLE CRAFT LIGHTS WERE FLAT WHITE LIGHTS, NO STROBE OR RED OR GREEN NAV LIGHTS AS CIVILIANS AIRCRAFT HAVE. THE TRIANGLE CRAFT DID HAVE THREE STIAGHT WHITE LIGHTS ON ITS BACK TRIANGLE PORTION (WING TIPS) FOR LACK OF BETTER TERM,WHICH WERE VERY FAINT. I WOULD ESTIMATE THE ALTITUDE AS THREE TO FIVE THOUSAND FEET OF THE FLY OVER.
